body: Problem solving for non-majors; high-level language programming; controlstructures, functions, parameters, recursion, arrays, records/ structures; verification; debugging; documentation.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: 2 entrance units in mathematics)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 102: Introduction to Visual Programming
